page.title: 15SECONDARY EDUCATION
page.content: Secondary education is different in the two villages. In Sheepscombe there is still selection for schools in Stroud. Stroud Girls High School and Marling School take the girls and boys who are of Grammar school standard and Archway school is a non selective comprehensive. Various schemes for the introduction of comprehensive education for all have ben suggested over the years but have not been introduced. The children in the Cranham parish can attend Brockworth Comp. School but some parents opt out and send their children to private schools in the Cheltenham area. Further Education is available at Stroud, Gloucester and Cheltenham.
